class.name: franka_controllers/WholeBodyController
class.description: A whole body controller that can control both Summit XL and Franka Panda.

class.name: franka_controllers/CartesianImpedanceController
class.description: A copy of cartesian_impedance_controller that can only control one Franka Panda.

class.name: franka_controllers/JointImpedanceController
class.description: A copy of cartesian_impedance_controller that can only control one Franka Panda.
